title: Bible Places Directory (English)
description: Blueprint for the Bible Places directory page, covering hero copy, resource links, and affiliate CTA.
content:
The introduction orients visitors with a paragraph about walking Scripture-rich ground and references semantic search to discover new verses before visiting. It mentions the top pilgrimage highlights (Jerusalem, Mount Sinai, Nazareth) and notes that pilgrims often pair those stops with the TourLeadForm to book curated trips.

The body reiterates internal links to featured places (Jerusalem, Mount Sinai, Nazareth), spans over to prayer resources (prayer points for pilgrims), and includes a callout to the semantic search tool for verse research.

Closing invites the reader to plan a trip through the affiliate TourLeadForm and thanks them for supporting the ministry as they explore the 30 000 € goal set via ethical partnerships.
